survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Grocery Shopping Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experience with AI-powered grocery shopping assistants, focusing on usability, features, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered grocery shopping assistant?
